page.title: 20FLOWERS AND CREEPY CRAWLIES
page.content: Insecticides,pollution and the cutting of grass verges by councils have greaty reduced the numbers of wild flower to be found in the contryside. Here in a count of wild flowers to be found in JULY 1985 after a cold, wet spring and early summer. birdseye speedwell, vetch, dog rose, forgetmenot, redclover, redleg, hedge woundwort, thistle, plantain, meadow buttercup, hop trefoil, crosswort dandelion, daisy, chickweed, shepherds puse, hedge parsley, stinging nettle, dock, potato flower Common Creepy Crawlies. Two of the most common are caterpillar and spider. The caterpillar is the larva of the butterfly which undergoes metamorphosis.It comes from the lepidoptera family.This is the life cycle:adult butterfly,eggs,larva, chrysallis......
